amendatorysection.para: The Secretary of State shall receive no compensation for services as a commission member other than any salary allowed by law, but shall be reimbursed for actual and necessary expenses. The appointed members shall be paid a per diem of fifty dollars for each day actually and necessarily engaged in the performance of their duties as members of such commission in addition to such expense allowance. Reimbursement for expenses shall be as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177.
